Computer.name: Encryption Inc. Vault Server
Computer.file:
The Decypher Suite, consisting of Decypher and DECHead, are two programs meant to run on Encryption Inc.'s famous encryption software. Decypher will decrypt all encrypted files, and DECHead will scan those files, showing you that file's basic information.
Usage: Decypher [file].dec [password] DECHead [file].dec
